grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 描写【ビョウシャ】depiction, description, portrayal
素描【ソビョウ】drawing, sketch, outline, summary, synopsis
kun reading compounds: 描く【えがく】to draw, to paint, to sketch, to depict, to describe, to picture in one's mind, to imagine, to form a certain shape (e.g. path of an action, appearance of an object, etc.)
